title: Ticket #307: Ill format cedar packet crashes master
description: If the cedar packet header has a length of zero bytes, cedar asserts early in. This can crash the master, (and then all the children). Turning on security doesn't help much, nor HOSTDENY, as that all happens later.
remarks:
2009-Mar-07 23:42:03 by gthain:
As far as I can tell, this bug has been in cedar since the beginning of time.
